btrplace.solver.choco.transition

Class ForgeVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.transition.ForgeVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition, VMTransition

    public class ForgeVM
extends Object
implements VMTransition
    Model a transition that will forge a VM to put it into the ready state.

    The VM must have an attribute (provided by Model.getAttributes() template that indicate the template identifier to use to build the VM image.

    An estimation of the action duration must be provided through a ActionDurationEvaluator accessible from ReconfigurationProblem.getDurationEvaluators() with the key ForgeVM.class

    If the reconfiguration problem has a solution, a ForgeVM action will inserted into the resulting reconfiguration plan.

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
